author: bridge-bot
content:
<unnawut> PR submitted for pq-devnet-2 draft high level plan: https://github.com/leanEthereum/pm/pull/48/files

I took the number from https://github.com/leanEthereum/leanMultisig?tab=readme-ov-file#xmss-aggregation to assume that we might be able to do almost 400-signatures aggregation, hence the 400 validators target and not yet accounting for validator duty overheads
